text: National Changhua University of Education (NCUE; ) is a national research university located in Taiwan.The main campus is in Changhua County.It was founded in 1745. ==Campus== National Changhua University of Education have two campus : Jin-De Campus and Bao-Shan campus The school has five masters, which is the culture of the school since its establishment. == Other websites == *National Changhua University of Education T Category:1745 establishments Category:Establishments in Taiwan
title: National Changhua University of Education
